FuncDef: This command configures an SLA profile string. Each subscriber identification string can be provisioned into a subscriber mapping table providing an explicit mapping of the string to a specific subscriber profile. This allows certain subscribers to be directly mapped to the appropriate subscriber profile in the event that the default mappings are not desired for the subscriber.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the SLA profile string, up to 16 characters.
Identifies the SLA profile name, up to 32 characters.
